name: The Deception of Oni
description:
A short Interactive Adventure Fiction game in the Dungeons and Dragons SRD ruleset. 

Play in this short Interactive Adventure Fiction  game adapted from the Dungeon and Dragons SRD ruleset by Wizards of the Coast! Choose between 3 character classes and solve the mystery plaguing the throne!

Will you be the Fighter, who attacks twice every turn of combat? Or perhaps play as the Cleric, capable of healing oneself. Would you keep to the shadows and sneak attack in combat as the Rogue. Choose wisely!

Advisory: Contains textual descriptions of violence, gore, blood and supernatural horror. Player discretion advised!
